ABOUT ME

ME AS A MUSICIAN

OVERALL

Hi there! I’m Pieti “Ghost” Pöntinen, solo musician and guitarist & second singer of Riddle Me This.

MUSICAL SKILLS

Guitar, composing, recording, music production, playing piano, creating backtracks.

TOOLS I USE

Main Guitars: Schecter Hellraiser C-1 Diamond Series, Schecter PT Custom (from Schecter Custom shop). Modeling amplifier & pedals: Line6 HD Pro X, FBV MKII, Line6 Relay G30, BOSS TU-3. Composing & recording: Guitar Pro 5, Cubase 5, Focusrite Scarlett 2i2.

MUSICAL HISTORY

The journey to this point has been long. I started my “music career” back in 2004 when I was 10 years old. After few years, I established my first band called “Pain of Despair” with my friends. Even I was 13 years old in 2007, we played our first show in festival called Astuvarock. After “Pain of Despair” I’ve played and been as featuring artist in many other projects and bands. After many years I decided to improve my playing skills and become professional guitarist. It was 2013 when I started new band called “Riddle Me This.” That was just a beginning. In 2016 we placed second in Finnish qualifiers in the World’s biggest band competition called Emergenza. Because of the success in the band competition, we have played tens of shows in Finland and abroad. It has been a long journey and now it is time to release our first album called “Universal Ego.”
